meanings.definition: A person who has an extreme or irrational fear of heights.
meanings.sent1: Acrophobes often feel anxious when they are on tall buildings.
meanings.sent2: Many acrophobes avoid going on roller coasters or climbing ladders.
meanings.sent3: The acrophobes at the top of the tower looked like they were glued to the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of heights turned her into an acrophobe, unable to enjoy the beauty of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The acrophobes' trembling hands and pale faces revealed their intense fear of heights.
